issue.title: [CI][C++] Support LLVM 13
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14364](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14364). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Major platforms have started to provide LLVM 13 packages which causes multiple build errors.

comments.body:
